name: the one where Ricardo wants to see the list of all owners using the clinic API

testSteps.description: When Ricardo sends a request to list all the owners using the clinic API

children.description: Ricardo executes a GET on the resource /owners/list

restQuery.responseHeaders:
vary: accept-encoding
Content-Encoding: gzip
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Tue, 17 Sep 2024 03:15:38 GMT

testSteps.description: Then the system should return a 200 response code

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the response status should be (200)

testSteps.description: And the response body should include the default owners registered in the system

reportData.title: Default Owners

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the owners in the latest api response should contain the default owners registered in the system

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to manage the owners information
  In order to handle all the pets and visits made by them
